title: Bot Bumper
description: Bot Bumper is an arcade action game where you'll take on the role of a feisty minibot in a futuristic arena teeming with rival minibots. In this adrenaline-fueled arcade action game, your objective is clear: outmaneuver, outwit, and outlast your opponents by strategically pushing them out of the arena or annihilating them with calculated collisions. Are you ready to prove your dominance in the arena? Strap in, rev your engines, and get ready to bump your way to victory in Bot Bumper!
